reviews.review: РАМЫВРАГН ОРВАПВГЫАПВЩГПАЩВЫГНА АНГПЫВАЩЫВАЩГ НАПЫВ НГВПАЩЫВГНА ПАПЫУГ АП ФЫАП У8АВАПЫВГНАПЫВГ А
so much fun playing wit my slatts
It's no Radical Heights, but I guess it'll do.

I have almost 2k hours in this game. I have to say this is the most toxic community I have ever met online. I was Mk2 before the rank change. Then when I reaquired my rank even though I had 30 kills in the game I still got ranked all the way silver elite and have literally never been able to rank up. Because of how rank works I have so many games that it takes 15 win IN A ROW to maybe rank up. I have been able to get to n1 BARELY and then the next day it told me that there was a hacker and it removes my rank. Win the next game and it puts me 3 ranks down again. Every single game has a hacker. Either on my team or the other team. Either that or there is lag, troll teammates, ping issues, or im just having a bad game. I love this game, obviously because I have so many hours and its where I built my stream but the game is now unplayable, every game is just a horrible experience. Do not play it!
